      Player Cell.getPlayer()

      Player Board.getPlayerFromCell(int cell)
      Searches within the players to find the player occupying the specified cell.
      Player Game.getWinner()

      Player Game.nextPlayer()

      Returns the players at the start.
      Methods in jeudeloie with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StartCell.leaveStart(Player player)
      Removes the player from the list of occupying players.
      void Board.moveTo(Player p, int cell)
      Moves the player to its new cell, swapping players if the new cell is already occupied.
      void Board.playTurn(Player p, int diceThrow)
      Plays the turn with the specified player.
